alert.note: Alert for Rota; Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 18 at 3:48AM ChST until January 18 at 6:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Rota, Tinian and Saipan. * WHEN...Until 6 PM this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles, and along higher terrain. Canopies, tarps, other loose structures and small objects will be blown away if not already fastened or secured. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The intense high pressure ridge behind the descending shear line will maintain very windy conditions through this afternoon. Conditions may improve thereafter, but winds will remain elevated through the weekend.
info.instruction: People should minimize their exposure outside due to the possibility of falling objects such as coconuts, breadfruit, and other hanging objects in jungle areas, including trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive, especially in or near higher terrain.
